attributes.action: sack the home office secretary Jacqui Smith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Secretaty,Jacqui Smith,prevented the Dutch MP Geerte Wilders,to come in the UK to attend a debate for security reason.We believe this is an unprecedented,unacceptable violation of the freedom of speech and,as such,we ask the Prime Minister to remove the Hon. Jacqui Smith for her office

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
